testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And I click Equation Editor button to open the Math Editor dialog and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: When I type "a/b" in the Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And I click Done in the Math Editor dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: Then I see the "a/b" Math Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: Then I assert that the "a/b" math is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: And I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and type some simple math in the editor
